ftm-ack-data-sources: This site also includes data from https://tinyurl.com/hospitals-needing-ppe, a project by:
ftm-add-donation-site-question: Do you work in a hospital or clinic and need PPE? Want to update or remove information?
ftm-have-you-donated-answer: Tell us how you helped by posting on findthemasks.
ftm-index-getmeppe-twitter-cta: Find where you can donate your masks or other personal protective equipment (PPE) in your local area.
ftm-index-need-find-masks: We need to find the masks
ftm-index-site-coalition: A member of the GetUsPPE.org coalition
ftm-index-types-of-ppe: If you know construction workers, vets, scientists, or dentists, please share this link with them.
ftm-index-where-to-find-ppe: Maybe you bought N95 masks a few weeks ago or already have some in your house. Right now healthcare workers are running dangerously low on PPE like masks, hospital gowns, booties, and face shields to protect them while they risk their lives to save others.
ftm-made-with-love: Made with <3 in Seattle by findthemasks.com
ftm-maps-search-placeholder: Search by city, zip, or address
ftm-index-protect-with-donations: By donating, you protect everybody: doctors, nurses, hospital staff, patients, and the general public.
ftm-site-launch-info: This site was launched on March 19th by Rachel Popkin and has been improved by many fantastic volunteers. Many of us are tech workers in Seattle. We are advised by a group of doctors and nurses around the country.
ftm-what-to-do-1: Use our map below to find a hospital or health center near you accepting donations.
ftm-what-to-do-2: Follow their instructions for what they accept and how to drop it off.
ftm-what-to-do-3: If you are donating opened packages, please put them in a ziploc bag with a note saying whether they have been used, whether anyone in your household has been sick or travelled outside the country, and the expiration date if known.
ftm-volunteer-network: Our network of volunteers has created a global map of over 1700+ locations, like hospitals and clinics, where you can donate your masks, gowns, and other PPE.
ftm-comments-questions: Got a comment or suggestion not related to data updates? Want to help?
ftm-contact-info: Email us at contact@findthemasks.com or join us on our Github.
ftm-cant-find-donation-site-question: Can't find a donation site near you?
ftm-large-donation-question: Need logistical help or compensation to donate 500+ items of PPE?
ftm-canada-large-donations: Please visit the province-specific ($1) if you have large donations, or the national efforts ($2) if you are a manufacturer or supplier.
ftm-canada-no-donation-sites-near-me: Email COVID19donationsCA@gmail.com to let them know where you are and what you have available. A volunteer will get back to you.
ftm-united-states-large-donations: Our partners at getusppe.org/give have an intake form where you can register, and a volunteer will get back to you.
ftm-united-states-no-donation-sites-near: Visit getusppe.org to let them know what you have available.
ftm-france-large-donations: Our partners at getusppe.org/give have an intake form where you can register, and a volunteer will get back to you.
ftm-france-no-donation-sites-near-me: Visit getusppe.org to let them know what you have available.
